loanPrograms.name: GSTOD
loanPrograms.info: In < 60 mins, get direct sanction of upto INR 1 cr based on submission of GST, ITR and Banking
loanPrograms.requirementListHeader: For Sanction in <60 mins, ensure that the customer keeps the following information ready

Documents.documentDisplayName: PAN Number and Address of the Applicant, all Guarantors and Group entities
Last 6M Bank Statements of all working capital limits and all major current accounts (in e-PDF format)
GST Username and Registered Mobile Number to receive an OTP  / GST registration Certificate along with last 12 months GSTR 3B acknowledgment
Income Tax Returns Password / Income Tax Return of Borrower along with Computation of Income for last 1 Year for company and guarantors
Proof of vintage establishing date of incorporation (e.g. Shops and Establishments Act certificate)
Proof of address establishing current business address

loanPrograms.name: TURBOOD
loanPrograms.info: In < 12 hrs, get sanction of upto INR 1.5 cr based on submission of 1Y Financials, GST, ITR and Banking
loanPrograms.requirementListHeader: For Sanction in <12 Hours, ensure that the customer keeps the following information ready

Documents.documentDisplayName: PAN Number and Address of the Applicant, all Guarantors and Group entities
Last 12M Bank Statements of all working capital limits and all major current accounts (in e-PDF format)
GST Username and Registered Mobile Number to receive an OTP  / GST registration Certificate along with last 12 months GSTR 3B acknowledgment
Income Tax Returns Password / Income Tax Return of Borrower along with Computation of Income for last 1 Year for company and guarantors
Proof of vintage establishing date of incorporation (e.g. Shops and Establishments Act certificate)
Proof of address establishing current business address
Last Audited Financials including P&L, Balance Sheet and all schedules
Declaration of key debtors along with their ageing cycles

loanPrograms.name: RAPIDOD
loanPrograms.info: In < 12 hrs, get sanction of upto INR 2.5 cr based on submission of 2Y Financials, GST, ITR and Banking
loanPrograms.requirementListHeader: For Sanction in <24 Hours, ensure that the customer keeps the following information ready

Documents.documentDisplayName: PAN Number and Address of the Applicant, all Guarantors and Group entities
Last 12M Bank Statements of all working capital limits and all major current accounts (in e-PDF format)
GST Username and Registered Mobile Number to receive an OTP  / GST registration Certificate along with last 12 months GSTR 3B acknowledgment
Proof of vintage establishing date of incorporation (e.g. Shops and Establishments Act certificate)
Proof of address establishing current business address
Declaration of key debtors along with their ageing cycles
Last 2 Year Audited Financials including P&L, Balance Sheet and all schedules
Latest projections of financials including understanding of key assumptions
Income Tax Returns Password / Income Tax Return of Borrower along with Computation of Income for last 2 Year for applicant and guarantors

loanPrograms.name: ENTERPRISE
loanPrograms.info: For limit requirement in the range of INR 2.5 cr - INR 5 cr
loanPrograms.requirementListHeader: For seamless loan processing, ensure that the customer keeps the following information ready

Documents.documentDisplayName: PAN Number and Address of the Applicant, all Guarantors and Group entities
Last 12M Bank Statements of all working capital limits and all major current accounts (in e-PDF format)
GST Username and Registered Mobile Number to receive an OTP  / GST registration Certificate along with last 12 months GSTR 3B acknowledgment
Proof of vintage establishing date of incorporation (e.g. Shops and Establishments Act certificate)
Proof of address establishing current business address
Latest projections of financials including understanding of key assumptions
Income Tax Returns Password / Income Tax Return of Borrower along with Computation of Income for last 3 Year for applicant and guarantors
Stock statement for the last 6 month
List of Debtors and their value (Latest available and last Financial Year)

collateral.description: LEASE HOLD RIGHTS / RETIREMENT BENEFITS-LIEN ON PF
SHARES AND INVESTMENTS-IDFC Bank deposits (Same Customer)
SHARES AND INVESTMENTS-IDFC Bank deposits (Different Customer/Third-party)
PAPER / INSURANCE BASED SECURITIES-GENERAL INSURANCE POLICY
PAPER / INSURANCE BASED SECURITIES-LIFE INSURANCE POLICY
PAPER / INSURANCE BASED SECURITIES-POSTAL LIFE INSURANCE
